subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Knicks won Game 2 by double-teaming the Pacers in the post and mobbing dribblers on pick-and-rolls, which, Kenyon Martin said, was also the plan in Game 1.
snippet: The Knicks won Game 2 by double-teaming the Pacers in the post and mobbing dribblers on pick-and-rolls, which, Kenyon Martin said, was also the plan in Game 1.
